articles.description: New details show the gold-plated interior of Former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate. CNN's Brian Todd reports.

articles.author: Andi Babineau, Jennifer Feldman and Kelly Murray, CNN
articles.title: 1-year-old dies after father intentionally left him in hot car, police say
articles.description: An Ohio father faces charges in the death of his 1-year-old son after he intentionally left the baby in a hot car, police said.

articles.title: Donald Trump has repeatedly called for lengthy jail sentences for those who he claimed mishandled classified information
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump has repeatedly called for the lengthy jailing of opponents of his who he claimed mishandled classified materials.
